content: When used in this conference call, words such as will, believe, expect, anticipate encourage and similar expressions as they relate to the company or its management, as well as assumptions made by any information currently available to the company's management, identify forward-looking statements within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. So whether it's a technology company, selling systems to retailers or a company selling compliance tools to automotive, we're looking at everything because we're simple to link to and we can provide them all the signals that they need.
